ingredients: 1 cup strawberries, 1  banana,   +   1/2 cup yogurt,   +   1/4 cup pineapple juice, 1   +   1/2 teaspoons white sugar, 1 teaspoon orange juice, 1 teaspoon milk
nutrition: Total Fat 1g 2%, Saturated Fat 1g 4%, Cholesterol 4mg 1%, Sodium 45mg 2%, Total Carbohydrate 31g 11%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 22g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 56mg 278%, Calcium 132mg 10%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 519mg 11%
